library.description: Utility to separate into parts and to format time duration in milliseconds.
library.name: duratiform

library.description: A web-based tool to view, edit and format JSON.
library.name: jsoneditor

library.description: Numeral.js is a tiny JS library for formatting and manipulating numbers.  Formats include number of decimals, currency, percentages, time, and more. It is lightweight, easy to localize, has no dependencies, and is available for use in the browser as well as node.js.
library.name: Numeral.js

library.description: Stringify an object/array like JSON.stringify just without all the double-quotes. Useful for when you want to get the string representation of an object in a formatted way.
library.name: stringify-object
